summary: This video discusses the use of AI in one-way video interviews for job applications. The narrator explains that while proponents of these interviews claim they are efficient and reduce bias, many detractors find them dehumanizing and unethical. The video examines concerns about lack of transparency and regulation in AI hiring technology, and how AI can exacerbate bias if not implemented carefully. The presenter advises job seekers to be professional and present themselves well, while also acknowledgeing that the system might be flawed.
